section.title: Features
section.description: Professional SaaS tools and Figma plugins designed for modern teams

items.title: Secure API Management
items.description: Manage and protect API keys with enterprise security, usage tracking, and customizable rate limiting for SaaS apps and Figma plugin workflows.
items.idea: Enterprise-grade API key management made simple.

items.title: Figma Plugin Proxy
items.description: Secure your Figma plugins with an OpenAI API proxy. Adds CORS protection, request validation, and automatic throttling for stable performance.
items.idea: A security and performance layer for plugins.

items.title: Help Desk System
items.description: Deliver scalable support with real-time chat, priority ticket workflows, and an admin dashboard designed for SaaS and plugin product teams.
items.idea: Professional ticketing built for SaaS products.

items.title: Developer-First
items.description: Accelerate plugin and SaaS integration with SDKs, code samples, and developer-focused toolkits designed to speed up onboarding and scaling.
items.idea: Everything devs need to build faster.

items.title: Premium Support
items.description: Access 24/7 expert help with SLA-backed response times, priority handling, and dedicated account managers for enterprise-level customers.

items.title: Production Ready
items.description: Built for reliability with monitoring, error tracking, and automatic failover‚Äîensuring 99.9% uptime for SaaS apps and Figma plugin products.
items.idea: Reliability and uptime baked into the core.

items.title: AI Rename Variants
items.description: Batch-rename Figma variants with AI. Context-aware analysis ensures consistent naming conventions, cleaner files, and reduced design debt.

items.title: Component Auditor
items.description: Audit components inside a single Figma file. Check naming, structure, and variant coverage to ensure consistent, high-quality component usage.
items.idea: File-level component audits for better design.

items.title: BiblioKit Blocks
items.description: Track design system adoption across Figma files with analytics. Measure ROI, spot duplicates, and optimize component libraries at scale.
items.idea: Cross-file analytics for design systems at scale.

items.title: UXBiblio
items.description: Analyze, capture, and organize UI patterns with AI. Run heuristic checks, accessibility reviews, and build team-shared UX libraries.
items.idea: Every webpage becomes a UX learning tool.
